name: Wild Omission
description:
Wild Omission is an open world multiplayer sandbox survival game with severe weather. Your goal survive, craft tools, and build bases that hold up against the most extreme weather. You can go at it alone, or with friends.



Whether it's your friends, a wild animal, or a tornado, pretty much anything and everything can kill you if you aren't careful. You must start off with nothing, and pull together to overcome all odds.


Use the resources you have gathered to craft tools, weapons, and shelter.


Build the house of your dreams, The only limit is your imagination, and what you can craft.


Weather is usually mild, but it can become deadly. Fortify your base and repair it when bad weather strikes.


Bring your friends along with you to help (or to grief your base). Create a community!
